root.description: Third (optional) step of the exact Large-Scale Mean-Shift segmentation workflow.

parameter.name: Segmented image
parameter.description: The segmented image input. Segmented image input is the segmentation of the input image.

parameter.name: Output Image
parameter.description: The output image. The output image is the input image where the minimal regions have been merged.

parameter.name: Minimum Region Size
parameter.description: Minimum Region Size. If, after the segmentation, a region is of size lower than this criterion, the region is merged with the "nearest" region (radiometrically).

parameter.name: Size of tiles in pixel (X-axis)
parameter.description: Size of tiles along the X-axis.

parameter.name: Size of tiles in pixel (Y-axis)
parameter.description: Size of tiles along the Y-axis.
